DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effectiveness Detrusitol ( tolterodine tartrate ) SR , 4 mg daily , patient 's perception symptom overactive bladder bothersome symptom improve treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Study Determine The Effectiveness Of Detrusitol In Patients Diagnosed With OAB
DOC.criteria: 18 year old patient suffer OAB symptom ( urinary frequency least 8 micturition per 24h , urinary urgency least 3 urge urinary incontinence episode within 3 day ) , confirm micturition bladder diary . Other urge incontinence History prostate/uterine female organ cancer
